definitions.definition: A tool that is used to trim the edges of a lawn .
A woodworking tool for straightening the edges of wood and cutting it into boards.
One who practises the sexual technique of edging .

main_definition: A tool that is used to trim the edges of a lawn .
secondary_definitions: A woodworking tool for straightening the edges of wood and cutting it into boards.
One who practises the sexual technique of edging .
